display_long_description:
A new dumb adventure awaits with Dumb Ways: Free For All! Available on the Quest 2, Quest 3 & 3s, play solo or bring up to FIVE other players along to experience the dumb mayhem together. Embark on a ‘mostly-safe’ vacation where each destination brings wild activities & unexpected surprises - all in the form of crazy, fun-filled minigames! 

# FREE FOR ALL MADNESS 
Multiplayer adds a new challenge to the game, as you compete head-to-head for the highest score! Watch out for your fellow travelers who are trying to sabotage your holiday, they will stop at nothing to throw you off your game, ruin your holiday & your winning streak.

[media]

# 100 DUMB MINIGAMES
Your epic journey across the globe will be filled with a whopping 100 unique minigames across four incredible destinations: Bumbling Bay, Jumble Jungle, Freezerville & Beanulon Prime. Feed monkeys, save freezing Beans, build robots & fend off hungry piranhas during your crazy holiday escapades! 

[media]

# CHAOTIC WEATHER 
Bad weather can ruin an otherwise perfect holiday, or in this case your top score. At the end of each minigame playlist, or “Tours”, brace yourself for an extra surge of adrenaline as the difficulty is ramped up as you face extreme weather events – from snowy blizzards to galactic meteor showers!

[media]

# LEVEL UP YOUR VACATION
Rack up XP by playing minigames and level up to unlock new Tours, wacky minigames, & eye-catching cosmetics to equip your Bean with – giving them a hilarious new outfit that’ll turn heads on every vacation adventure!

[media]
